A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the best Star Wars installments. I was extremely disappointed by The Force Awakens\,  but The Last Jedi makes up for it in bounds. There were quite a few unexpected events\, great character interactions\, fun side adventures\, and some great new characters. The overall pacing of the movie was fantastic and I enjoyed the ending not being your typical Marvel ending. There were also some great dialog throughout the movie\, with far fewer one liners than expected. Lastly\, I really liked them wiping the slate in terms of the lore with the Jedi and Sith\, we had 7 movies of that\, it's time for a new adventure and new lore.
